content: Trying to validate against the CI build of the CG IG on my local machine: java -jar validator_cli.jar FHIR_Testexport.json -version 4.0 -ig hl7.fhir.uv.genomics-reporting#dev

Which fails:

hmmm. Still not working here. Maybe a problem related to how directories are represented? I'm on a mac. Will investigate.
